name: AIr Fight
description:
This game is my participation to the Wowie Jam 4.0, with the theme "Collaborate with AI".

Dash into the enemies to earn points, and dodge their bullets to survive!

The goal is to earn the most points before getting hit 5 times or falling to the floor. To help you, you have a flying board controlled by an AI that will bring you to the enemies' boards and catch you when you are falling.

Bullets do not deal damage when you are using the dash.

The music I used is "Exciting Arcade Music - Half Alive"

You can mute/unmute the music by pressing the "M" key.
